body:
I have checked the documentation of GCC (https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/). The option "-Wno-incompatible-pointer-types" is not yet available in the latest GCC 4.x version, but it is available as of the first GCC 5.x versions.

Since you are using GCC version 4.2.1 you can't use option "-Wno-incompatible-pointer-types" yet. Please migrate to GCC 5.x or later.
title: gcc how to suppress incompatible pointer type warning?
